document.full_text: paul lawrie won the andalucian open on sunday for his first european tour victory since 2002 and sixth overall after holding off johan edfors of sweden by one stroke.
document.title: lawrie wins andalucian open by 1 stroke
lines_and_colors: paul lawrie won the andalucian open on sunday for his first european tour victory since 2002 and sixth overall after holding off johan edfors of sweden by one stroke.
